tweet: After a year of development with our partners, we've officially launched the first autonomous and decentralized #Marketplace for #Industry40 today. This goes much beyond our #IOTA Data Marketplace from 2017, and is an actual product that we are rolling out across industries.  https://t.co/rxUXg3ZRAb

We just released Trinity Desktop 1.1.0. This new version brings a selection of stability fixes, node basic auth, specific node for proof of work, and more. Download it here:  https://t.co/cI5TTFBxx2 #IOTA #Trinitywallet  https://t.co/FNdRkQY6e0

The #IndustryMarketplace is the turning point for #Industry40 and brings us one step closer to a fully autonomous and decentralized #MachineEconomy. Learn more about the platform & its architecture.  https://t.co/pDWtdGlAAu  Participate now at  https://t.co/m0yHmT1OXu #IOTA  https://t.co/evXTFiEYzV

This is probably the moment people in 2 years remember as the day they should have listened and invested in #IOTA Banking crisis incoming, #IOT is here, IOTA on its way to standardization, Coordicide update on the way. Which project looks better, honestly?

We are uniquely positioned to create a vendor- and industry-neutral platform that is first and foremost targeted at enabling a frictionless and permissionless Machine Economy, powered by #IOTA. Our platform is open-source and together with #eClass we are on-boarding more members.

“The #IndustryMarketplace is designed to solve the current issues around creating a common standard language for autonomous #M2M communication,” says Thorsten Kroke, Head of Digital Processes & Standards, eCl@ss.  https://t.co/Fo9kbf40TR @eClassStandard #IOTA #Industry40

#IOTA foundation launches the world’s first autonomous and decentralized marketplace! @NeoceptionDE and @PepperlFuchs are proud to be part of this initiative.   ▶ Learn more in the official press release:  https://t.co/uVe6hN0M4C  #AutomationPassion #IoT @iotatoken @businesswire  https://t.co/fiEd5qIcwr

#IOTA Foundation announced launch of an autonomous marketplace where devices will communicate with one another to exchange goods and services. Industry 4.0 is still far off, but this is what IOTA was designed to do, so it’s good to see it stay true to its vision.  #altcoins
